grid_system.display: flex flex-col items-center justify-center h-screen w-screen overflow-hidden relative

CountdownTimer.description: Massive central timer. Uses Monospace font for stability. Glowing effect.

VideoPlayer.description: Full screen background video player. Handles looping and transitions.
VideoPlayer.style: absolute inset-0 w-full h-full object-cover opacity-60

AdminCard.description: Dashboard widgets for schedule and video management.
AdminCard.style: bg-surface border border-surface_border rounded-xl p-6 shadow-xl backdrop-blur-sm

StatusBadge.description: Indicator for current display state (TVC / Countdown / Berbuka).
StatusBadge.style: px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider

universal_guidelines: Use 'Bebas Neue' for all headings to give a cinematic feel.
Ensure the countdown is the absolute visual center of the screen during the 120-min window.
Use the 'Frestea Green' (#57C12C) for primary actions and 'Frestea Purple' (#4A148C) for backgrounds/depth.
Admin panel should be clean, high-contrast dark mode for readability in low-light control rooms.
Always use data-testid attributes for interactive elements.
Do not use gradients for text unless it's the countdown numbers.
Images must be high resolution. Use the provided Unsplash links as fallbacks.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts via Google Fonts import in index.css. 2. Configure Tailwind colors in tailwind.config.js using the palette provided. 3. Create the 'Display' page as the home route ('/') and 'Admin' page at '/admin'. 4. Mock the backend logic for now: Use local state or context to simulate the time-based flow (TVC -> Countdown -> Berbuka). 5. Use Shadcn for the Admin interface but customize the colors to match the dark purple theme.
